channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump tries gunboat diplomacy after wavering on Iran strikes
item.description: For the third time since returning to office, President Trump is seeking a nuclear deal with Iran . While U.S. officials say the renewed effort is sin...

item.title: Ex-Google engineer found guilty of stealing AI secrets for China
item.description: A former Google engineer was found guilty of economic espionage and theft of confidential AI technology for the benefit of China's government, the FBI...

item.title: Gabbard says Trump asked her to attend FBI raid at Georgia elections hub
item.description: Director of National Intelligence Tulsi Gabbard said Monday President Trump requested her presence during an FBI search of an election center in Georg...

item.title: Why the Epstein scandal may never die
item.description: The internet is awash in speculation, suspicion and disgust over the millions of new pages of Jeffrey Epstein files released by the Justice Department...

item.title: Bill and Hillary Clinton agree to testify in House Epstein investigation, ahead of contempt vote
item.description: The Clintons faced a vote on contempt of Congress after not appearing for scheduled depositions.

item.title: House GOP searches for votes to reopen government with razor-thin majority
item.description: House Democrats have indicated privately that they do not plan to support the plan, leaving Republicans to go it alone.

item.title: Despite 3 million files, Epstein release leaves big questions unanswered
item.description: The members of Congress who wrote the law requiring disclosure of the files are still looking for explanations.

item.title: Federal officers in Minneapolis to start wearing body cams, DHS says
item.description: The decision to equip federal agents in Minneapolis with body cameras comes after federal agents in the metropolitan area shot and killed two people.

item.title: House to vote on reopening government, extending ICE funding
item.description: The deal would fund most of the government through September. But Congress would have only 10 days to fund the Department of Homeland Security.

item.title: Behind the Curtain: 3 historic shifts simultaneously rattling society
item.description: You can only fully understand politics, business and your own anxiety in 2026 by reckoning with the three, once-in-a-generation shifts unfolding at on...

item.title: Trump in Iowa tries to shift the conversation back to the economy
item.description: A brief swing through the farm state underscored administration fears about the midterms.

item.title: Americans give Trump low marks on handling of economy as midterms likely to center on affordability
item.description: Sixty-one percent of voters told a CNN poll released Friday that they disapprove of the way Trump is handling the economy.

item.title: Capitol agenda: Trump tests GOP with Fed probe
Ex-Trump voters swung hard to Democrats over costs in NJ & VA, new research shows
item.description: Voters who backed Donald Trump in 2024 and swung to Democrats in this year's Virginia and New Jersey elections did so over economic concerns, accordin...

item.title: Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
item.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
